full_text:
Since the 2019 election more Tory MPs represent seats with a higher number of pupils on free school meals.

Britain Elects' @spreadsheetben gives his take on today's government U-turn:
https://t.co/J7rduEVnOC

[mapped: seats where the % of pupils eligible for FSM is above avg] https://t.co/KBuE3qOWk6
